question: Do I need to be from Sao Paulo to participate in the event
answer: No we are happy with participants from all over brasil. If you need a financial support for travelling to Sao Paulo you can apply for a grant

question: Which language will be used during the event
answer: The main language for the event is english. But of course all important informations will be both in english and portugese as well. The team of mentors and organisators is a mixed language team speaking german, english and portugese.
